meanings.definition: A monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a peso in several Latin American countries.
meanings.sent1: In some Latin American countries, you can buy small candies for just a few centimos.
meanings.sent2: I found a few centimos in my pocket and used them to buy a newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted centimos, so I had to search for some in my bag.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was worth more than a million centimos.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the centimos jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: I found a shiny centimos in the fountain while making a wish.
meanings.sent2: The street performer collected many centimos from generous passersby.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a centimos from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright as the newly minted centimos.
meanings.sent5: The old man's collection of centimos was a testament to his thrifty nature.
